Wisdom: الْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ أَفْضَلُ الزَّادَيْنِ
enWisdom: Righteous action is the better of the two provisions

Wisdom: الْمالُ وَالْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ الْحَياةِ الدُّنْيا وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ حَرْثُ الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: Wealth and children are the ornaments of this worldly life while good action is the tillage of the Hereafter

Wisdom: الْقَرِينُ النَّاصِحُ هُوَ الْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ
enWisdom: The [most] righteous companion is righteous action

Wisdom: أَنْفَعُ الذَّخَائِرِ صَالِحُ الْأَعْمَالِ
enWisdom: The most beneficial provision [for the hereafter] is good deeds

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ يُغْنِيَ عَنْكَ بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ إِلَّا صَالِحُ عَمَلٍ قَدَّمْتَهُ فَتَزَوَّدْ مِنْ صَالِحِ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: Verily nothing but the good deeds that you sent forward will be of any benefit to you after your death, so gather the provision of good deeds

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى اكْتِسَابِ صَالِحِ الْأَعْمَالِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْكُمْ إِلَى مَكَاسِبِ الْأَمْوَالِ
enWisdom: You are surely in greater need of earning good deeds than you are of earning wealth

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ مُجَازَوْنَ بِأَفْعَالِكُمْ فَلَا تَفْعَلُوا إِلَّا بِرّاً
enWisdom: Verily you are requited for your actions, so do not do anything except good

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنِ اغْتَنَمْتُمْ صَالِحَ الْأَعْمَالِ نِلْتُمْ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ نِهَايَةَ الْآمَالِ
enWisdom: Verily if you seize the opportunity to perform righteous deeds [in this world], you will attain your greatest aspirations in the Hereafter

Wisdom: بِالصَّالِحَاتِ يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى حُسْنِ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: Through righteous deeds, the strength of a believer’s faith is deduced

Wisdom: بِالْأَعْمَالِ الصَّالِحَاتِ تُرْفَعُ [تَعْلُو] الدَّرَجَاتُ
enWisdom: By righteous deeds, ranks are raised

Wisdom: بَادِرُوا صَالِحَ الْأَعْمَالِ وَالْخِنَاقُ مُهْمَلٌ وَالرُّوحُ مُرْسَلٌ
enWisdom: Take the initiative to perform good deeds [now] while the neck is free from the noose and the spirit is unfettered

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْعَمَلِ الصَّالِحِ كَأَصْلِهِ
enWisdom: The fruit of righteous action is [righteous] like its root

Wisdom: ثَقِّلُوا مَوَازِينَكُمْ بِالْعَمَلِ الصَّالِحِ
enWisdom: Make your weighing scales heavy with righteous acts

Wisdom: ثَمَنُ الْجَنَّةِ الْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ
enWisdom: The price of Paradise is good deeds

Wisdom: خُذْ مِنْ صَالِحِ الْعَمَلِ وَخَالِلْ خَيْرَ خَلِيلٍ فَإِنَّ لِلْمَرْءِ مَا اكْتَسَبَ وَهُوَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مَعَ مَنْ أَحَبَّ
enWisdom: Partake in the best of actions and befriend the best of friends; for verily every person will get that which he has earned and will be with the one whom he loves in the Hereafter

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ بَادَرَ صَالِحَ الْعَمَلِ قَبْلَ أَنْ تَنْقَطِعَ أَسْبَابُهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who hastens to perform good deeds before his means are cut short

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِصَالِحِ الْعَمَلِ فَإِنَّهُ الزَّادُ إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ
enWisdom: You must undertake righteous actions for indeed it is the provision that leads to Paradise

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَوْثَقُ الذَّخَائِرِ عِنْدَكَ الْعَمَلَ الصَّالِحَ
enWisdom: Let your most reliable provisions be [your] righteous actions

Wisdom: مِنَ السَّعَادَةِ التَّوْفِيقُ لِصَالِحِ الْأَعْمَالِ
enWisdom: It is part of felicity to be granted success in performing righteous deeds

Wisdom: لَا تِجَارَةَ كَالْعَمَلِ الصَّالِحِ
enWisdom: There is no trade like good deeds

Wisdom: لَا ذُخْرَ أَنْفَعُ مِنْ صَالِحِ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: There is no provision more beneficial than righteous deeds

Wisdom: لَا يَسْتَغْنِي الْمَرْءُ إِلَى حِينِ مُفَارَقَةِ رُوحِهِ جَسَدَهُ عَنْ صَالِحِ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: A person cannot dispense with his need for righteous deeds until the time when his soul leaves his body

Wisdom: لَا يَسْتَغْنِي عَامِلٌ مِنَ الِاسْتِزَادَةِ مِنْ عَمَلٍ صَالِحٍ
enWisdom: Nobody can ever dispense with his need for increasing his good deeds

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِالسَّدَادِ مَلَكَ
enWisdom: One who acts aptly, acquires [success]

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ الصَّوَابِ تُنْبِئُ عَنْ وُفُورِ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Increased correctness points to abundant intelligence

Wisdom: فِعْلُ الْخَيْرِ ذَخِيرَةٌ بَاقِيَةٌ وَثَمَرَةٌ زَاكِيَةٌ
enWisdom: The good action is a lasting store and a pure fruitage

Wisdom: افْعَلُوا الْخَيْرَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ فَخَيْرٌ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ فَاعِلُهُ
enWisdom: Do good deeds as much as you can, for better than the good deed is the one who does it

Wisdom: افْعَلِ الْخَيْرَ وَلَا تُحَقِّرْ مِنْهُ شَيْئاً فَإِنَّ قَلِيلَهُ كَثِيرٌ وَفَاعِلَهُ مَحْبُورٌ
enWisdom: Do good and do not consider any of it insignificant, for verily little of it is plenty and its doer is happy [in the Hereafter]

Wisdom: الصَّوَابُ أَسَدُّ [أَشَدُّ] الْفِعْلِ
enWisdom: Correctness is [performing] the most appropriate action

Wisdom: فَاعِلُ الْخَيْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: The doer of [a] good [deed] is better than it
